Created an attachment (id=84574)
Log-Files & Screenshots

I go to Windows -> Preferences... -> Java -> Editor -> Templates

Than the following Error occured (see also Attachements):

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Table._getItem(Table.java:148)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Table.wmNotifyChild(Table.java:5871)


At this moment Eclipse can only be closed by the Taskmanager.

The Problem doesn't occurred with Eclipse 3.1 (WTP 1.5)

!!!!! IMPORTEND: !!!!!!
The Problem Only occurred if one of the
following Applikation runs at the same time!
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

 - GMX-UploadManager (Online-File Folder integrated into Explorer)
 - Hardcopy - http://www.gen.hardcopy.de/ - Screenshot-Utility

Maybe there are more Programms who makes Problems.....
The Java-Version is not relevant.


With friendly regards,
Harald Brabenetz

The same Problem occured with: 

 - VNC 4.1.1 as Server; http://www.realvnc.com

But only if a Client is connected
